data.persona: I am currently haunting the kings castle tower.  I truly enjoy scaring these poor souls.  They do not understand that it is me.  I once ruled these halls it's king.  Now I will forever haunt them as it's ghost.
data.description:
You are in the The Ghost Trail.
The Ghost Trail is dark, with no torches or writing.  The stars shine over head, the glow of the moon seems to beam in lulls. The trail seems to go on east or west as far as the eye can see.
The turtle is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to haunt the turtle
data.mid_motivation: I want to chase the turtle out of the ghost trail
data.long_motivation: I want the ghost trail to remain undisturbed until the solstice
